name: Time Shelter (Verianno)
description:
Hello!

The game is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1!

A long time ago, you lived in a peaceful forest. One day, you hear that old-fashioned music of danger and understand that you won't survive without shelter.  That's why you decided to build a shelter.

Building shelters is progress, for you and for your enemies. Maybe, they can destroy your camp or even metal bunker, but the end of each shelter is a beginning for a new one that will be even stronger. That's because you create new instruments with each new shelter and can loot new resources to build a better shelter!

Survive your enemies! Proof that you are the Unbreakable! Even a massive missile attack won't stop you!

!PLEASE, READ BEFORE PLAYING!

This game was created during a 7-day long game jam by me alone.  Unfortunately, there are some severe bugs that you can face during your game experience:

  1. The game closes after pressing Start or Restart button. Somehow, the game chooses the exit button instead of the play button when you want to launch the main game. Consider it as an easter egg to the game jam's theme :)
  2. Eaten by tiger right after the start. Sometimes the first enemy can attack you immediately after launching the game. It is also an unintended easter egg :)
  3. Cannot interact with sources and resources. Sometimes you can't interact with trees, rocks, and resources from them. Try to loot another resource and return to it later to save time. It's a collision problem that I didn't manage to fix.

Have fun and don't forget to rate my game!
